HOSPITAL
Pinlon Hospital is a 200-bed private multi-speciality hospital that has been serving the residents of Yangon and the neighbouring regions since 2007.

HOSPITAL

HOSPITAL

SSC
HOSPITAL
SSC is a 200-bedded multi-specialty private hospital that has been serving the residents of Yangon since 2001. Renowned for being one of the leading private healthcare institutions in Myanmar, SSC core values are in Quality, Experience & Compassion.

BAHOSI
HOSPITAL
Bahosi Hospital is a free standing Multi-Disciplinary Specialist Center located at Building no. 31-36, 1-2, 5-6, Bahosi Hospital was opened in 1994 and has been providing health services to patients with the motto “Health for All”.

HOSPITAL
Grand Hantha International Hospital was established in 2017. It's for the integration of advanced healthcare programs lead by highly skilled medical staff and cutting-edge technologies and facilities.

SAKURA
HOSPITAL
Sakura hospital, one of the most historic private hospitals in Myanmar, was opened since 1st January 1998. Sakura Hospital is providing multidisciplinary medical care services not only with modern day medical technologies and equipment but also with excellent and prompt treatments.
